title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
